Package xtc.lang

Language-specific support for C and Java.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
C The C tool.
CAnalyzer A visitor to type check C programs.
CAnalyzer.CompletenessCheck The state for checking incomplete types.
CCounter A visitor to collect statistics on a C program.
CFactoryParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.CFactory.
CFeatureExtractor A visitor to extract C features.
ClassfileSourceRemapper A class file post-processor to rewrite a class file for the remapped line number table or to append a SMAP attribute to the class file.
CParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.C.
CParserState The global state for parsing C.
CParserState.Context A parsing context.
CPrinter A pretty printer for C.
CReader Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.C.
FactoryFactory A factory of factories.
Java The Java tool.
JavaAnalyzer A visitor that constructs a symbol table for a Java compilation unit.
JavaAnalyzer.JavaContext  
JavaAstSimplifier A visitor that simplifies Java ASTs.
JavaEntities Common functionality for handling Java entities outside the AST.
JavaEntities.JavaTypePrinter  
JavaEntities.UnicodeUnescaper  
JavaExternalAnalyzer A visitor that constructs externally visible types and fills the symbol table for a Java file.
JavaFactoryParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.JavaFactory.
JavaFiveParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.JavaFive.
JavaFiveReader Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.JavaFive.
JavaNoSourceAnalyzer Uses reflection to construct externally visible types and fill in the symbol table for entities for which no source code is available.
JavaParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.Java.
JavaPrinter A pretty printer for Java.
JavaReader Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.Java.
JavaRecognizer Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.Java.
JavaSevenParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.JavaSeven.
JavaSevenReader Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.JavaSeven.
JavaTypeConverter Java type conversions and promotions.
JavaUnitTests JUnit tests for Java-related classes in package xtc.lang.
JavaUnitTests.IgnorableTest  
JavaUnitTests.WriterOutputStream  
SourceMapExtractor A class to extract a line number mapping for a source-to-source transformation.
TypedLambda A tool for reading and writing simply typed lambda calculus expressions.
TypedLambdaParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.TypedLambda.
TypedLambdaPrinter A pretty printer for the simply typed lambda calculus.
 

Package xtc.lang Description

Language-specific support for C and Java.
